::Hot Rod/Prowl::

Hot Rod is rather surprised by the reaction, no one had ever acted like
that towards him.
"Please stand up. I'm nothing special, and dont deserve that. I'm just
another Autobot."

Prowl then arrives.
"Prowl, maximize."
He transformes to bot mode.
"Hello. I'm sure we can benifit from salvaging your ship. However we
should wait for the Autobot representatives to arrive. Then you can tell
us how you ended up here on past Earth."
